Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Gomez's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Gomez somehow came into contact with a group named "the Saviors" which he subsequently joined. Gomez aided his group in terrorizing other survivors and communities around the area into subjugating to Negan's will, where their victims would be forced to give half their supplies in exchange for not being murdered. Gomez is among the Saviors to raid the Kingdom with Gavin . He stands guard around the captured townspeople as Gavin demands them to hand over King Ezekiel . Gomez is carrying out orders until he was taken out by Morgan as they sneak around the Kingdom on a rescue mission. Gavin attempts to radio Gomez for his location but is unsuccessful in receiving an answer, leading him to believe something wasn't right.
Death[]: Killed By Morgan Jones While guarding the Kingdom as Ezekiel is about to be taken to the Sanctuary, Gomez is stabbed in the chest by Morgan. Later, he is stabbed in the head by Morgan to prevent his reanimation.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Gomez has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Name: Gomez
